/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that characterize Beijing. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
